channel.title: Can anyone help meh?
channel.description:
i'm just wondering....how do i add objects? i don't mean add objects like server side were i just put objects in places what i mean is how do i make my own objects for my client (Client Side).....i got RSMV i found some models that i like and i would like to add the models to my client whitch i know all i do is put the models into my models folder in all but how can i edit the colors of'em and thier ints (ect) anyone know?
also how do i rename a objects id so that way i can use it In-Game so i can make such objects like walls? and does anyone know how i can edit floor objects so i can make sertian places have a diffrent floor?
PLEASE PLEASE HELP!
IF I CAN I WILL R3P++

item.title: Can anyone help meh?
item.dc:creator: @caboose420 caboose420
item.description:
@caboose420 wrote:

i’m just wondering…how do i add objects? i don’t mean add objects like server side were i just put objects in places what i mean is how do i make my own objects for my client (Client Side)…i got RSMV i found some models that i like and i would like to add the models to my client whitch i know all i do is put the models into my models folder in all but how can i edit the colors of’em and thier ints (ect) anyone know?

also how do i rename a objects id so that way i can use it In-Game so i can make such objects like walls?
and does anyone know how i can edit floor objects so i can make sertian places have a diffrent floor?

PLEASE PLEASE HELP!

IF I CAN I WILL R3P++
